item-1.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item-1.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial.

item-2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
item-2.answer: You can cancel your subscription by visiting the billing page.

item-3.question: Can I change my plan?
item-3.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time by visiting the billing page.

item-4.question: What is the refund policy?
item-4.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you are not happy with our product.

item-5.question: Can't find what you're looking for?
item-5.answer: Please contact our customer support team at support@qiflowai.com

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: QiFlow AI is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to QiFlow AI.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on QiFlow AI template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of QiFlow AI template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: QiFlow AI is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love QiFlow AI! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: QiFlow AI is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: QiFlow AI has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: QiFlow AI is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love QiFlow AI Ã¢ÂÂ¤Ã¯Â¸Â. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: QiFlow AI templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: QiFlow AI is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!
